table.searchString: sourcetype=cisco:ios eventtype="cisco_ios-acl_log" NOT [inputlookup cisco_ios_acl_excluded_ips | fields acl_src_ip] | table _time,host,acl_list,acl_proto,acl_src_ip,acl_src_port,acl_dst_ip,acl_dst_port,acl_action
table.title: Access Control List logs (excluding hits from local management IPs)
